name: WP Zen-Coding
author: Hiroshi Hoaki

sections.description:
This plugin will not be update anymore.

Install the WP Emmet instead and use the Emmet (previously known as Zen Coding).
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload wp-zen-coding directory to /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Can use ‘Zen Coding’ in textarea of admin page(wp-admin)
  4. Please change setting from Zen Coding of the Settings menu if necessary

short_description: WP Zen-Coding is a awesome Zen-Coding plugin for WP admin page.
